ABOUT.TITLE: What is the Playbuzz Platform?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION:
The Playbuzz Platform is the first-ever article creator that enables users to break their narratives into engaging experiences and deliver an interactive, visually-stunning journey to readers.
What do I do now?
ABOUT.STEP_1: Create your article with content experiences
ABOUT.STEP_3: Share or instantly embed to your site

ERROR.SAVING_DISABLED: Saving is disabled. Please try again in 5 minutes
ERROR.COVER_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: Cover photo failed to upload. Try another file!
ERROR.DIFFERENT_CHANNEL: You don't have permissions to edit this item

DELETE_SECTION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this?

CONVO.TITLE_LABEL: Create a dialogue that fits today’s communication habits.
CONVO.TEXT_1_LABEL: Make readers feel as though they are reading someone’s text messages.
CONVO.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Convo template that looks and feels like iOS messenger.
CONVO.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use Convo to create a list or timeline of events. Simply upload a number or date as the image for each “participant”.

FLIP_CARD.TITLE_LABEL: Invite readers to click and reveal the other side.
FLIP_CARD.TEXT_2_LABEL: Create the perfect “before and after” experience.
FLIP_CARD.TEXT_3_LABEL: Warn readers about graphic content or spoilers.

PARAGRAPH.TITLE_LABEL: Use text to form the base for your article.
PARAGRAPH.TEXT_2_LABEL: Your reader's’ eye will immediately be drawn to the highlighted text. Make sure to highlight the important parts that they need to read.

POLL.TITLE_LABEL: Encourage readers to get involved and share their views.
POLL.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use a poll to getting your readers involved. Give them a chance to throw in their 2 cents! For example, asking what they think about something on social media.
POLL.TEXT_2_LABEL: Display the vote count to show readers how others feel about the topic.
POLL.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use a background image and choose the Grid template to create a visually awesome poll that is fun to interact with!
POLL.TEXT_4_LABEL: Remember to always include a “none of the above” option to give your readers an easy out if none of the options suit them.
POLL.TEXT_6_LABEL: Add an image to each option.

QUOTE.TITLE_LABEL: Highlight words of wisdom with a designed quote.
QUOTE.TEXT_1_LABEL: Short and sweet; keep your quotes to the point and easy to read.
QUOTE.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include the quotee’s image and name to add context.

SUMMARY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Offer a TL;DR version of your article.
SUMMARY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Share recipes using the sidebar text box.
SUMMARY.TEXT_3_LABEL: There are no wrong answers with our new +1 mode.

VIDEO_CREATOR.TITLE_LABEL: Incorporate video in a flexible, low-cost manner.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use the classic template to create a video list with GIFs and images.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Vs. template to compare and contrast a topic that your readers care about.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_3_LABEL: Every screen in the Vs. template will compare a subtopic under the larger comparison with text, images and GIFs!
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_4_LABEL: Use the Facts template to list facts about something important to your readers.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_5_LABEL: Each slide in a Facts video has large text over a background image.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_6_LABEL: Use the Swift template to create a quicker video with a an intro screen that automatically pulls visuals from all of your video’s slides.

QUIZ.TEXT_1_LABEL: Give readers insights on what they care about most - themselves.
QUIZ.TEXT_2_LABEL: Choose a color-palette for your Personality Quiz.

TRIVIA.TEXT_3_LABEL: Give readers feedback and further insights.

MEDIA.TITLE_LABEL: Search, upload, or paste links to add the perfect videos, images, GIFs and social media posts.
MEDIA.TEXT_1_LABEL: Blur images to add mystery and hide graphic content or spoilers.
MEDIA.TEXT_2_LABEL: Add movement to your image with the zoom-in effect.
MEDIA.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the blur effect to give readers the choice to decide if they want to see graphic content or not.
MEDIA.TEXT_4_LABEL: Embed Google Maps to share specific locations.
MEDIA.TEXT_5_LABEL: Include any video from Vimeo or YouTube.
MEDIA.TEXT_6_LABEL: Embed Twitter posts to make your content more interesting and engaging.
MEDIA.TEXT_7_LABEL: Embed Instagram posts to make your content more visually stunning.
MEDIA.TEXT_8_LABEL: Use any video on Vimeo to make your article more interesting.
MEDIA.TEXT_9_LABEL: Use any video on Youtube to make your article more interesting.

EMBED.TEXT_1_LABEL: Embed Google Maps to share specific locations.
EMBED.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include any video from Vimeo or YouTube.
EMBED.TEXT_3_LABEL: Embed Twitter posts to make your content more interesting and engaging.
EMBED.TEXT_4_LABEL: Embed Instagram posts to make your content more visually stunning.

IMAGE.TEXT_1_LABEL: Blur images to add mystery and hide graphic content or spoilers.
IMAGE.TEXT_2_LABEL: Add movement to your image with the zoom-in effect.
IMAGE.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the blur effect to give readers the choice to decide if they want to see graphic content or not.

VIDEO_PLAYER.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use any video on Vimeo to make your article more interesting.
VIDEO_PLAYER.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use any video on Youtube to make your article more interesting.

CHECKLIST.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use checklist to make your article more interesting.
CHECKLIST.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use checklist to make your article more interesting.

BTN_INTRO_BUBBLE.TITLE: Video creation - reinvented!
BTN_INTRO_BUBBLE.DESC: Check out our AI-powered video creation tool.

SECTION_INTRO_BUBBLE.TITLE: Smart content deserves smart video!
SECTION_INTRO_BUBBLE.DESC: Add your content and hit "optimize & preview " to let our AI-powered algorithm automatically select the best layout.

CONVO.TITLE: Let readers watch the conversation unfold before their eyes
CONVO.MESSAGE: A great way to bring users information in the format they're most used to: text messages. Tip: Add images and names for each speaker to bring the text to life.

FLIP_CARD.TITLE: Give them something to click about
FLIP_CARD.MESSAGE: Use suspense to tempt readers to click to the 'back' side of your flip card. Tip: Add text to tease what they can expect to see after they click.

PARAGRAPH.TITLE: How to create the best paragraph
PARAGRAPH.MESSAGE: Photographs are a way of preserving a moment in our lives for the rest of our lives. Many of us have at least been tempted at the flashy

POLL.TITLE: Ask users what they think
POLL.MESSAGE: Give readers an active role in your article by asking them a question. Keep in mind: people love engaging with polls to see how their opinions compare to others.

QUOTE.TITLE: Make your content more effective with a quote
QUOTE.MESSAGE: Highlight key parts of your text to make sure your readers don't forget it. Tip: Add a background photo or gif to make your quote shine.

SUMMARY.TITLE: Break it down for readers
SUMMARY.MESSAGE: Summary Cards help to condense ideas and articles into something readers can understand at a glance. Tip: this experience is great for recipes.

VIDEO_CREATOR.TITLE: Easily create engaging videos
VIDEO_CREATOR.MESSAGE: Start with the key points you want to include in your video, building the story and adding visuals as you go. Tip: Combining video with interactivity (like polls) can boost dwell time!

QUIZ.TITLE: Give readers an experience that's all about them
QUIZ.MESSAGE: Turn your results into something you'd want to read about yourself – if readers like what you tell them, they'll be back for more! Tip: Using images for quiz answers creates an even more engaging user experience.

TRIVIA.TITLE: Put your readers to the test
TRIVIA.MESSAGE: Trivia questions compel users to engage more deeply. Tip: don't start or end with your hardest question – you don't want users to think it's too hard or leave them feeling discouraged! [note: don't love 'staring' – kind of zombielike]

MEDIA.TITLE: Make your content stand out with visuals
MEDIA.MESSAGE: Adding photos, gifs, or embeds is a great way to breathe life into a story and help to engage users. Tip: You can make your photos interactive with our blur tool

CHECKLIST.TITLE: How to create the best checklist
CHECKLIST.MESSAGE: Photographs are a way of preserving a moment in our lives for the rest of our lives. Many of us have at least been tempted at the flashy

CALL_TO_ACTION.TITLE: How to create the best cta
CALL_TO_ACTION.MESSAGE: Photographs are a way of preserving a moment in our lives for the rest of our lives. Many of us have at least been tempted at the flashy

LEAD_FORM.TITLE: How to create the best lead form

FEATURED.FLIP_DESC: Build suspense with the allure of a big reveal that readers have to click to discover.
FEATURED.QUIZ_DESC: Make any story personal by enticing readers with the satisfaction of self-discovery.
FEATURED.POLL_DESC: Everyone has an opinion! Ask a question to cast your readers’ votes.
FEATURED.LIST_DESC: Make any story digestible with an elevated take on the classic internet listicle.
FEATURED.CONVO_DESC: Conversations presented in a way that everyone can relate to: text messages.
FEATURED.RANKED_LIST_DESC: Let them have their say! This interactive list rearranges itself as readers' votes take control.
FEATURED.VIDEO_DESC: Readers love videos, so create them in just minutes! No experience or team required.
FEATURED.TRIVIA_DESC: Give readers a challenge by asking questions to test their knowledge.
